title: Jixuecao (Herba Centellae Asiaticae) alleviates mesangial cell proliferation in IgA nephropathy by inducing mitofusin 2 expression.
abstract: To investigate the effect of mitofusin 2 (Mfn2) and its downstream signaling pathway on glomerular mesangial cells (GMCs) proliferation in IgA nephropathy (IgAN), as well as the mechanism of action of Jixuecao (Herba Centellae Asiaticae, HCA) in the treatment of IgAN.
